name: The Adventures of Dianalee in "The Lost Temple of the Aztecs"
name_original: The Adventures of Dianalee in "The Lost Temple of the Aztecs"
description:
The Adventures of Dianalee in "The Lost Temple of the Aztecs" is an arcade game developed by Bill Loraine and Menlor. It came out on 01-01-1993. Menlor published the game.
You can play The Adventures of Dianalee in "The Lost Temple of the Aztecs" on PC.
